metadata.Title: CVE-2019-20016 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
libmysofa before 2019-11-24 does not properly restrict recursive function calls, as demonstrated by reports of stack consumption in readOHDRHeaderMessageDatatype in dataobject.c and directblockRead in fractalhead.c. NOTE: a download of v0.9 after 2019-12-06 should fully remediate this issue.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-20016` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmysofa-utils - 0.9~dfsg0-1
libmysofa1 - 0.9~dfsg0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libmysofa package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9~dfsg0-1').
